enter-account: Enter your account to see your new activity!
create-account: Create a free account to access all our features and keep track of your group expenses!
error-first-name-length-min: First name must have at least 3 characters
error-first-name-length-max: First name must have at most 20 characters
error-username-length-min: Username must have at least 3 characters
error-username-length-max: Username must have at most 20 characters
error-password-length-min: Password must have at least 6 characters
error-password-length-max: Password must have at most 20 characters
error-password-missing-letter: Password must contain at least one letter
error-password-missing-number: Password must contain at least one digit
total-by-day-by-type: Total expenses per day, by type
total-by-type-by-user: Total expenses per user, by type
forbidden-sorry: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page.
page-not-found-descr: Sorry, the page you requested could not be found. Please go back to your trips.
trip-create-subtitle: Get ready to make the best out of your trip.
trip-edit-subtitle: Get ready to make the best out of your trip.
member-access-subtitle: Add or remove users for this trip
expense-create-subtitle: Add a personal or group expense to keep track of your spendings.
users-to-split-label: With whom will the expense be split?
landing-page-desc: Want to go on a trip with your friends? No need to worry about the expenses! You can have them all in a single place!
track-expenses-smart: Track your expenses in a smart way
pres-item-desc-1: Members of a trip can split and pay the same amount for an expense.
pres-item-desc-2: See different statistics of your expenses in a trip, but don't forget to check out the personal statistics too!
pres-item-desc-3: Find your trips, expenses and debt payments all in a single calendar!
complete-payment-desc: Mark a debt as paid. Remind others to pay their debts.
add-group-personal-expense-desc: Track personal and group expenses and manage them separately
analyze-expenses-desc: Find out more about your expenses in the past by reading the statistics
notify-expense-subtitle: Every user whom you split the bill with will be informed via mail.
